dependencies.package: XenInfo: Install it BEFORE you download this widget

descriptionlist.description:
Installed to: /var/mobile/Library/LockHTML (for LS) and /SBHTML (for HS)

Apply with Xen HTML
Optimised for all iOS (including iOS11) & fits all resolutions (including iPX)
Requires XenInfo for weather/battery components to work properly

Need help?
Brief instructions contained in the TXT within the widget folder
Link to tutorials in my pinned tweet
